name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
description: Floral aroma with bright acidity and hints of citrus and berries.

name: Colombian Supremo
description: Smooth body with balanced acidity, caramel sweetness, and nutty undertones.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
description: Rich, earthy flavors with low acidity and a hint of chocolate.

name: Guatemalan Antigua
description: Complex, full-bodied coffee with notes of chocolate and spice.

name: Kenyan AA
description: Bright acidity, juicy berry flavors, and a wine-like finish.

name: Brazil Santos
description: Mild, nutty flavor with low acidity and a smooth finish.

name: Jamaican Blue Mountain
description: Smooth, mild flavor with bright acidity and hints of nuts and chocolate.

name: Costa Rican Tarrazu
description: Bright acidity, smooth body, and notes of citrus and honey.

name: Hawaiian Kona
description: Delicate, fruity aroma with a smooth, rich body and hints of chocolate.

name: Mexican Chiapas
description: Mild, sweet flavors with bright acidity and a clean finish.
